title: SmartBreak one-page marketing website (sections, visuals, animations, contact form)

requirements.summary: Create a single-scroll, single-route page that renders all 9 SmartBreak sections in the specified order.
acceptanceCriteria: Page renders all 9 sections in the specified order on a single scrollable route (no missing sections).
Each section has a clear heading matching the provided titles/headline text (or the exact provided Hero headline).
Layout remains readable and visually coherent across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Create the single-page landing view that composes and renders the 9 required sections in order (Hero, Problem, Our Solution, How It Works, Technology & Innovation, Simulation & Proof, Impact, About/Research Background, Contact). Use consistent section wrappers and IDs for in-page navigation.
Create a reusable section wrapper component (container widths, spacing, background treatment, section anchor id) used by all 9 sections to ensure consistent layout and predictable scroll targets.
Wire the SmartBreakLandingPage into the app so it is reachable as the single scrollable route (avoid adding extra top-level pages).
Create a lightweight header/navigation component for in-page jumps to the 9 sections (uses section IDs).
Wire SiteHeader into the landing page layout and ensure each section has a stable anchor id matching nav targets.

requirements.summary: Apply the SmartBreak dark deep-tech theme (dark-blue base, electric-yellow accents, modern sans-serif typography) consistently across the full page.
acceptanceCriteria: All sections consistently use the dark-blue + electric-yellow palette (no random/competing accent colors).
Typography uses a modern sans-serif system with consistent heading/body scales.
Buttons, cards, and icons share a consistent style (radius, shadows/glow, borders) across sections.

file_operations.description: Define/adjust global theme tokens and base styles to achieve a dark-blue primary background and electric-yellow accent system, set modern sans-serif typography, and apply consistent spacing/typography scale.

Extend Tailwind theme with SmartBreak-specific palette aliases (dark blues + electric yellow), subtle glow/shadow utilities, and any needed typography scale helpers for consistent engineering-style visuals.
Add a small centralized constants file for reusable className strings (button variants, card styles, section backgrounds) to keep styling consistent across all sections.
Compose a consistent CTA button using the shadcn-ui Button component (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Compose a consistent card style using shadcn-ui Card primitives (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement the Hero section with exact copy, two CTAs, downloadable local PDF, and a subtle animated power-grid background.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero displays the exact headline and subheadline text.
“Request Demo” scrolls smoothly to the Contact section.
“Download Technical Brief” downloads a local static placeholder PDF from the frontend (no backend needed).
Background includes a subtle animation effect (e.g., moving grid lines/particles) without harming readability or performance.

file_operations.description: Create the Hero section with the exact headline/subheadline text, two CTA buttons, and a background layer that renders the generated hero grid image with a subtle animation overlay while maintaining readability. Use composed shadcn-ui Button for CTAs (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the generated hero background illustration asset for the hero power-grid / transmission-line look.
Add a local static placeholder PDF to satisfy the 'Download Technical Brief' CTA download requirement.
Include HeroSection at the top of the page and wire the 'Download Technical Brief' CTA to the local file at frontend/public/assets/technical-brief.pdf.

requirements.summary: Add smooth in-page scrolling and subtle on-scroll entrance animations for key elements across sections.
acceptanceCriteria: In-page CTA jumps use smooth scrolling.
Each major section has at least one subtle entrance animation triggered on scroll/visibility.
Animations do not block interaction and remain performant on mid-range laptops and mobile devices.

file_operations.description: Create a small hook/utility to perform smooth scroll-to-section behavior (by element id), used by header nav and Hero CTA.
Create an IntersectionObserver-based hook to apply entrance animation classes when elements become visible, optimized for performance.
Create a wrapper component that uses useInViewAnimation to add subtle entrance animations to headings/cards/diagrams on scroll.
Wire header navigation items to use useSmoothScroll for in-page section jumps.
Wire 'Request Demo' CTA to smooth-scroll to the Contact section anchor id.
Apply AnimatedInView to at least the section heading and the infographic block so they animate in on scroll.
Apply AnimatedInView to at least the architecture diagram and bullet content.
Apply AnimatedInView to the stepper/flow container for a subtle entrance animation.
Apply AnimatedInView to the cards grid for subtle entrance animation.
Apply AnimatedInView to the waveform graphic and bullets.
Apply AnimatedInView to the hero/impact visual and bullet list.
Apply AnimatedInView to the about text block.
Apply AnimatedInView to the contact form container so it animates into view without blocking interaction.

requirements.summary: Implement the Problem section with provided bullets and an infographic-style 3-step chain visual.
acceptanceCriteria: Problem section heading matches the provided title.
All listed bullet points are present and readable.
Infographic-style visual clearly shows the 3-step chain with arrows in the specified order.

file_operations.description: Create the Problem section titled exactly “The Hidden Danger in LV Distribution Networks”, render the provided bullet points, and display the infographic-style visual that communicates: Broken conductor → Live wire → Public danger.
Add the generated problem infographic asset for the 3-step chain visual.
Wire ProblemSection into the landing page in the required order and ensure it has a stable anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement the Our Solution section with provided bullets and an architecture diagram in the specified node order.
acceptanceCriteria: Solution section includes all provided bullet points.
Architecture diagram displays the 5 nodes in the specified order with arrows connecting them.
Diagram remains legible on mobile (stacks or scrolls horizontally gracefully).

file_operations.description: Create “The SmartBreak Solution” section with the provided explanation bullets and render the architecture diagram visual: Consumer Unit → RF Communication → Transformer Control Unit → Isolation Actuator → SMS Alert, ensuring responsive behavior on mobile.
Add the generated system architecture diagram asset.
Wire SolutionSection into the landing page in the required order and ensure it has a stable anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement How It Works as a 6-step horizontal flow with icons that degrades to a vertical stepper on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 steps appear in the correct order with icons.
On desktop the layout reads as a left-to-right flow; on mobile it degrades to a vertical stepper without losing the step order.
Icons and connectors/arrows are consistent in style with the rest of the site.

file_operations.description: Create the 6-step How It Works section with the exact step text, consistent icon usage, and responsive layout (horizontal flow on desktop, vertical stepper on mobile).
Add the generated icon set asset for the How It Works steps.
Wire HowItWorksSection into the landing page in the required order and ensure it has a stable anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement Technology & Innovation as six responsive tech cards with icons and labels matching the provided highlights.
acceptanceCriteria: Six cards are displayed, one per highlight, each with an icon and label.
Cards are responsive (grid layout adapting across breakpoints).
Card styling fits the dark-blue + electric-yellow theme and is consistent across the site.

file_operations.description: Create Technology & Innovation section with six tech-style cards (one per provided highlight) and consistent icon treatment; compose cards using FeatureCard (built on shadcn-ui Card, do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the generated icon set asset for the Technology & Innovation cards.
Wire TechnologySection into the landing page in the required order and ensure it has a stable anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement Simulation & Proof section with “MATLAB Simulation Results”, provided bullets, and a waveform-style graphic placeholder.
acceptanceCriteria: Section heading includes “MATLAB Simulation Results”.
All simulation bullet points are present.
A waveform-style graphic placeholder is displayed and scales for mobile/desktop.

file_operations.description: Create the Simulation & Proof section including the “MATLAB Simulation Results” heading, the provided bullet list, and the waveform graphic placeholder with responsive sizing.
Add the generated waveform-style simulation placeholder asset.
Wire SimulationSection into the landing page in the required order and ensure it has a stable anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement Impact section with exact title, provided bullets, and strong power-infrastructure visual storytelling.
acceptanceCriteria: Impact section title matches exactly.
All five impact bullets appear.
Section includes at least one strong visual (photo-style or illustration) consistent with power infrastructure theme.

file_operations.description: Create the Impact section titled exactly “Impact on Society”, render the five provided bullets, and include strong visual storytelling using the generated power-infrastructure and/or impact illustration assets.
Add the generated realistic power distribution infrastructure hero/impact image asset.
Add the generated impact storytelling illustration asset.
Wire ImpactSection into the landing page in the required order and ensure it has a stable anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement About/Research Background section including the provided project context sentence and matching site styling.
acceptanceCriteria: About/Research section is present and includes the provided sentence verbatim or as a clearly equivalent paragraph without changing meaning.
Section styling matches the rest of the page and remains readable in dark theme.

file_operations.description: Create the About/Research Background section and include the provided project context sentence (verbatim or clearly equivalent), styled consistently with the dark theme.
Wire AboutSection into the landing page in the required order and ensure it has a stable anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Build the Contact section form with validation, two submit CTAs that record which CTA was used, and success/error UI states after submission.
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes Name, Organization, Email, Message inputs with basic validation (required fields, valid email).
There are two submit buttons labeled exactly as specified; submission records which CTA was used.
On successful submit, the UI shows a clear confirmation state and resets or disables appropriately; on failure, it shows a clear error message.

file_operations.description: Create the Contact section with inputs (Name, Organization, Email, Message), basic validation, two submit buttons labeled exactly “Partner With Us” and “Request Pilot Deployment”, and success/error states. Compose inputs/buttons using shadcn-ui components (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a react-query mutation hook that uses useActor to call the backend createSubmission capability and passes the selected CTA type along with the form data; expose loading/error/success state to the ContactSection.
Wire ContactSection as the final section in the page, ensure it has a stable anchor id used by Hero 'Request Demo' smooth-scroll, and ensure overall page remains single-route.

requirements.summary: Add required static diagram/visual assets under public assets and render them from the frontend without backend image serving.
acceptanceCriteria: All required visuals are included as static files under the frontend public assets directory and referenced by the UI.
No backend endpoints are used to serve images/diagrams.
Visuals render crisply on retina displays and scale appropriately across breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Ensure the generated hero background visual exists as a static asset and is referenced by the Hero section UI.
Ensure the generated problem infographic exists as a static asset and is referenced by the Problem section UI.
Ensure the generated solution architecture diagram exists as a static asset and is referenced by the Our Solution section UI.
Ensure the generated waveform placeholder exists as a static asset and is referenced by the Simulation & Proof section UI.
Ensure the generated realistic power infrastructure image exists as a static asset and is referenced by the Impact section UI.
Ensure the generated impact storytelling illustration exists as a static asset and is referenced by the Impact section UI.
Ensure the generated icon sprite/set exists as a static asset and is referenced by the How It Works section UI.
Ensure the generated tech feature icon sprite/set exists as a static asset and is referenced by the Technology & Innovation section UI.
Reference the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-grid-bg.dim_1920x1080.png for the Hero background (no backend image serving).
Reference the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/problem-infographic.dim_1400x700.png for the infographic visual (no backend image serving).
Reference the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/solution-architecture-diagram.dim_1600x900.png for the architecture diagram (no backend image serving).
Reference the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/matlab-waveform-placeholder.dim_1600x600.png for the waveform placeholder (no backend image serving).

Reference the static assets frontend/public/assets/generated/power-infrastructure-photo.dim_1600x900.png and/or frontend/public/assets/generated/impact-visual.dim_1600x900.png for strong visuals (no backend image serving).
Reference the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/how-it-works-icons.dim_1024x1024.png and use consistent icon extraction/rendering for the 6 steps (no backend image serving).
Reference the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/tech-feature-icons.dim_1024x1024.png and use consistent icon extraction/rendering for the 6 cards (no backend image serving).
